FS.content: Apollonian ecstasy cannot embrace force, movement which displaces lines, nor force as desire for itself, nor writing > fallen Dionysianism, melancholy, nostalgia
difference btwn Dionysus & Apollo, ardor & structure, cannot be erased in history, because not in history > itâ€™s an original structure, the opening of history, historicity itself
Dionysus is worked over by difference, always appears (to himself) by a relationship to his exterior, his death [fire]
